item.title: 'I was sure it was offside' - why did Wirtz equaliser stand?
item.description: Florian Wirtz thought his goal for Liverpool in the 2-2 draw at Fulham was offside - so how did technology allow it to stand?

item.title: Danish PM tells Trump to stop 'threats' against Greenland
item.description: Mette Frederiksen said the "US has no right to annex any of the three nations in the Danish kingdom".

item.title: Auschwitz survivor Eva Schloss dies aged 96 as King leads tributes
item.description: King Charles said he was "privileged and proud" to have known Eva Schloss who died in London on 3 January.

item.title: Police identify all 40 victims of Swiss bar fire
item.description: Among those killed by the blaze at Le Constellation is 16-year-old Swiss national Arthur Brodard, his mother confirms.

item.title: Snow and ice warnings issued ahead of Monday return to work
item.description: The Met Office warns of disruption to travel as many people return to work and school after Christmas.
